bike.description: Specialized FACT 6r carbon, triple monocoque construction, compact design, Zertz inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, cartridge sealed bearings, alloy 20mm cone w/ one 10mm and two 5mm alloy spacers
Specialized Pro-Set lightweight stem, 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt 31.8mm bar clamp, 4-position adjustable
Specialized Zertz Comp, 6061 alloy, Zertz damper, short-reach drop, ergonomic top shaping, 31.8mm
Body Geometry Bar Phat, Soft-Touch cork ribbon w/ 2.5mm gel padding
Shimano R600, Hollowtech II 2-piece compact crankset
Specialized Roubaix Pro, 700x23/25c, aramid bead, 120TPI, Flak Jacket
Specialized Roubaix Pro, 700x23/25c, aramid bead, 120TPI, Flak Jacket
Specialized Toupé Gel, super light foam, carbon reinforced base, microfiber cover
Specialized Pavé, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
